# hex2ascii

> Convert hex to ascii in JavaScript.

# Install

```bash
npm install hex2ascii
```

# Docs

- **hex2ascii**(hex)

    - {string} hex - required hex string

# Usage

```javascript
const hex2ascii = require('hex2ascii')

console.log(hex2ascii('0x68656c6c6f20776f726c64')) // "hello world"
```

# Test

```bash
npm test
```
